data.meta_description: Caversham Booksellers, Toronto, Canada: Specialising in books on psychoanalysis, psychotherapy, psychiatry, psychology; in-store, at conferences and via mail order. 15,000 titles actively stocked
data.text:
Drawing upon the clinical expertise of professionals and the personalexperiences of those formerly involved in high-intensity mind-controlgroups, this book is a comprehensive guide to the cult experience.

Caversham Booksellers

98 Harbord St, Toronto, ON M5S 1G6 Canada

(click for map and directions)
